title: Monday Post Show (05-09-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (05-09-22)
description:
Amy recaps what she did for Mother’s Day with her kids. Eddie shared what he did for his wife on Mother’s Day. Bobby reveals what could be causing the guy's hair loss on the show. Eddie said he would do terribly in jail after going to the social security office. Amy’s daughter wants to go to an interesting camp this summer. Bobby is doing a big clean up in his digital and possessions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
